articles.title: County revenue allocation formula faces Supreme Court challenge
articles.description: County revenue allocation formula faces Supreme Court challenge. County Revenue Allocation continues to dominate Kenyan policy discourse as stakeholders weigh in on the implications for ordinary citizens.
articles.content: County revenue allocation formula faces Supreme Court challenge. The County Revenue Allocation has been a subject of intense debate across Kenya. Analysts say the policy will have significant implications for the devolution sector. Various stakeholders including civil society groups, business associations, and county governments have expressed diverse opinions on the matter.
